title: Заступницы
overview: «Zastupnitsy» are real journalistic investigations and solutions to real problems of real people. Where to go if the father of your children is hiding from alimony? How to get payments if the boss illegally fired or withheld wages? What to do if the ex-wife wants to deprive you of parental rights during a divorce? How to divide property after 15 years of marriage? "Advocates" will find answers to these and other questions and help achieve justice.
